Articles.Content:
How do you change the decal image? I haven't seen an explanation on that.

Back on page 16 you stated:

- One square decal, can toggle between 10 stored textures by default. Can toggle between various flat and rounded shapes/sizes to fit anywhere.

I see where the original png is, so I just threw some of my own in there and none can be toggled in-game, just changes the shape/size of that darn rat.

Edited July 29, 2014 by JonBar
I haven't got missiles help !!!
You need the lasor system mod installed

oops, wrong thread.

deleted..

Considering you are using the same license as B9 Aerospace, you could include an updated version of B9-Interim while you are at it. (Go ahead and include module manager files to put a temporary balance on costs for 0.24.x as well.)

If you start using github from your project, you can create a reference to auto-pull the latest B9-Interim tree for your packages.

I installed this mod earlier today, and none of the textures seem to be loading. All the parts from this mod specifically are just grey.

I have several other mods installed, list below... (all are latest versions)

B9 Aerospace REPACK and fix

Environmental Visual Enhancements + Better Atmospheres

Firespitter

Texture Replacer, Custom Asteroids, Kittopia Ingame Terraforming Tools

Distant Object Enhancement

Burn Together

Spaceplane Plus

and Mechjeb 2.

Any help would be appreciated, since I love the look of these parts. Thanks in advance.

^ It's probably that Repack and Fix, B9 needs to be in it's original folder structure or this mod wont find the original textures in there original place. None of the other mods in your list should effect it I don't think.

^ It's probably that Repack and Fix, B9 needs to be in it's original folder structure or this mod wont find the original textures in there original place. None of the other mods in your list should effect it I don't think.

If it's the repack I did or a derivative thereof, it does use the original structure, since the fixes are mostly Module Manager based. So unless there has been fiddling done, that should be fine.

How do you change the decal image? I haven't seen an explanation on that.

Back on page 16 you stated:

I see where the original png is, so I just threw some of my own in there and none can be toggled in-game, just changes the shape/size of that darn rat.

I've wondered this too.

Eskandare: are you using 64- bit?

Because I do and not even firespitter alone works for me...

Edit: If you are, could you send me a copy of your B9 and D12?

Yes I'm using 64 bit. My B9 and D12 are not special. I just update the *.dll files, and the community module manager fixes.

one think i can compare is bad names for cocpits mk1 and mk2 is types of shapes connections so some of them have bad names

and nice to see navball in cocpit

Eskandare: Strange, because I did that as well, it still crashes...

I've got the feeling, my KSP doesn't want any Mods... -.-

I seem to be encountering a strange...bug, I guess. You all know of the Mk2 Inline, single-man pod, right? Well, wouldn't you know it, I can't seem to be able to go on EVA from it, as seen here.

As you can see, there's nothing attached to the cockpit, and nothing in the way (of course, it's in midair). If any of you have encountered somthing similar or know how to fix this, any help would be greatly appreciated.

Cheers!
in the sph my textures on some items of d12 keep glitchin out , like they have 2 textures merged together

found another bug not sure what part it was but it wouldnt allow me to place, remove parts and i couldnt leave the hanger. all it did was make the sound when you remove something

EDIT: found what causes the problem, its the D12 canard set (also they wouldnt place on anything)

Edited August 23, 2014 by BLUESHADOW125
no sounds from engines only change is that i removed canards
Keep up the good work!
Any chance for an update to B9 5.0? Some things have changed around, including texture names. That might cause some incompatibilities.
Seeing as the OP hasn't made a post in 2 months, chances look slim. It's a shame, I really loved some of these models.
It is standalone? I don't want to download B9 mod.

No, it isn't.

Seeing as the OP hasn't made a post in 2 months, chances look slim. It's a shame, I really loved some of these models.

It had a number of useful parts and a lot of useless ones. K3Chris expressed some passing interest in them (most cockpit IVAs), maybe he'll pick them up. The bicoupler is nice, engines in general are always good, and there were some aerodynamic pieces that were useful. It's very much fixable, I've got it to work, but I've removed some parts I didn't use.

It is standalone? I don't want to download B9 mod.

Nope. It was built as addon to the old version of B9 and requires a bunch of textures and IVAs from B9.
I had some success in fooling around with filenames. If I get time I could have a stab at getting some of the best parts to work again. No promises!

I've got this installed with the B9 R5.0 pre-release and several of the IVA's dont show up. I didn't expect this cus 5.0 doesn't remove any parts, only depreciates them. Thoughts? chance of an update?
I stripped everything out except for the cockpits and IVAs.
